footer.protecting: Protecting global health through innovative vaccine solutions.

hero.title: Smart Vaccination Management Platform
hero.subtitle: Using Blockchain technology to ensure transparency and safety in the vaccination process

service.title: Secure Information with Blockchain
service.subtitle: Our decentralized system ensures your vaccination data remains private while still being verifiable by authorized parties.

immutableData.title: Immutable Data
immutableData.description: Once recorded on the blockchain, your vaccination data cannot be altered or deleted, preventing fraud.

instantVerification.title: Instant Verification
instantVerification.description: Authorized parties can verify your vaccination status within seconds without compromising privacy.

globalAccess.title: Global Access
globalAccess.description: Your digital vaccine passport works everywhere, recognized across borders and healthcare systems.

cart.emptyDesc: Discover amazing products and start shopping today!
cart.title: Shopping Cart

vaccine.defaultDesc: This is a premium quality product designed to meet your needs.
vaccine.defaultFullDesc: This premium product is designed with the highest quality materials and craftsmanship.
vaccine.qualityCommitment: Our commitment to quality ensures that every product meets rigorous standards.
